description: Implement missing operations to improve test coverage: expanding median/quantile, rolling sem, EWM corr/cov, and DataFrame aggregates (mean/sum/std/var)

userStories.title: Enable stats patches in __init__.py
userStories.description: As a developer, I want stats patches enabled in the main init file so that stats operations are available to users.
acceptanceCriteria: Stats patches imported and applied in __init__.py
No syntax errors in modified files

userStories.title: Implement expanding median operation
userStories.description: As a data analyst, I want df.expanding().median() to work with Numba optimization so that I can compute expanding medians efficiently.
acceptanceCriteria: Handles NaN values correctly with skipna parameter
userStories.notes: Implemented using quantile(0.5) reuse pattern. Patched in expanding.py

userStories.title: Implement expanding quantile operation
userStories.description: As a data analyst, I want df.expanding().quantile(q) to work with Numba optimization so that I can compute expanding quantiles efficiently.
acceptanceCriteria: Handles NaN values correctly with skipna parameter
userStories.notes: Already implemented - just needed to add patch. Patched in expanding.py

userStories.title: Implement rolling sem (standard error of mean)
userStories.description: As a statistician, I want df.rolling(N).sem() to work with Numba optimization so that I can compute rolling standard errors efficiently.
acceptanceCriteria: Handles NaN values correctly with skipna parameter
userStories.notes: Already complete - implemented and patched in rolling.py

userStories.title: Implement EWM correlation
userStories.description: As a data analyst, I want df.ewm().corr(other) to work with Numba optimization so that I can compute exponentially weighted correlations efficiently.
userStories.notes: Implemented in ewm.py with nogil kernels, threadpool, pairwise support. Patched.

userStories.title: Implement EWM covariance
userStories.description: As a data analyst, I want df.ewm().cov(other) to work with Numba optimization so that I can compute exponentially weighted covariances efficiently.
userStories.notes: Implemented in ewm.py with nogil kernels, threadpool, pairwise support. Patched.

userStories.title: Implement DataFrame aggregate operations
userStories.description: As a data analyst, I want df.mean(), df.sum(), df.std(), df.var() to work with Numba optimization on both axis=0 and axis=1 so that I can compute aggregates efficiently.
acceptanceCriteria: aggregates.py created with Numba implementation for mean/sum/std/var
Tests pass for all four aggregate operations
Handles NaN values correctly with skipna parameter
userStories.notes: Created aggregates.py with all 4 operations, both axes, patched in __init__.py

userStories.title: Add comprehensive tests for new operations
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want comprehensive tests for all new operations so that I can verify correctness and prevent regressions.
userStories.notes: Tests added to test_expanding.py, test_ewm.py, and created test_aggregates.py

userStories.title: Verify all implementations and run full test suite
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to run the full test suite and verify all implementations work correctly so that the release is production-ready.
acceptanceCriteria: All new operations work as expected
userStories.notes: 92 tests passed, 0 failed. Oracle verified. NaN handling bug fixed. Commit 49b0caf
